issue.title: [CF 321] Lua error of DR icon
issue.body:
When you choose the DR icon or type some spell(s) with DR icon, if that editbox is empty or that spell(s) is not from DR-XXX will got this error.

2x TellMeWhen: Group: 1, Icon: 1: TellMeWhen\Types\dr.lua:182: table index is nil
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r279.lua:3283: in function "Icon_Update"
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r279.lua:3199: in function <TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3197>

Locals:
nil


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #321 | Raw

comments.body:
And apparently the fix doesnt work either


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

There we go.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
